sentences.en: Andhad gone over those parts and had given them much exhortation, he came into Greece.
sentences.cn: 走遍了那一带地方,用许多话劝勉门徒, (或作众人)然后来到希腊.

sentences.en: As for exhortation, he argues that in practice, religion is not a legitimate source of morality.
sentences.cn: 至于劝解, 他辩说到,在实际中宗教并非道德的正统来源.

sentences.en: But one who prophesies speaks to men for edification and exhortation and consolation.
sentences.cn: 林前14:3但作先知讲道的、是对人说、要造就、安慰、劝勉人.

sentences.en: He accompany me, however, not lose one moment in continuing his exhortation.
sentences.cn: 他陪著我, 然而不失时机地继续他对我的的规劝.

sentences.en: Let me also say this: The promotion of human rights cannot be about exhortation alone.
sentences.cn: 我还要这样说: 促进人权不能仅限于规劝告诫.

sentences.en: That once conceded, I return to my exhortation.
sentences.cn: 这件事交代以后, 我再回头来说我的劝告词.

sentences.en: There followed an exhortation to all Germans " not to give up the struggle. "
sentences.cn: 遗嘱接着号召全体德国人 “ 不要放弃斗争 ”.

sentences.en: This is an exhortation for us too.
sentences.cn: 我们今天的讲道也是如此.

sentences.en: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation, to doctrine.
sentences.cn: 13你要以宣读, 劝勉,教导为念, 直等到我来.

sentences.en: Till I come , give attention to reading , to exhortation, to doctrine.
sentences.cn: 13你要以宣读 、 劝勉、教导为念, 直等到我来.

sentences.en: Until I come, attend to the public reading , to the exhortation, to the teaching.
sentences.cn: 13你要注重宣读 、 劝勉 、 教导,直等到我来.

sentences.en: Until I come, give attention to the public reading of Scripture, to exhortation and teaching.
sentences.cn: 提前4:13你要以宣读 、 劝勉、教导为念 、 直等到我来.

sentences.en: We are surrounded, on a day, by the exhortation to act.
sentences.cn: 我们每天都被这些劝导我们行动的话语包围着.

sentences.en: What does this exhortation demonstrate about God's heart for sinful people?
sentences.cn: 这个叮嘱展示上帝对犯罪的人民是什麽样的心情?

sentences.en: Why the incoming President's advance exhortation in favor of the decision?
sentences.cn: 爲什麽当选总统要提前对服从裁决提出劝告?

trans.tran_cn: 敦促，极力推荐，（正式的）演讲，（宗教仪式中的）劝诫
